titles.title: God can do it again and again and again,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God can do it again and again and again,
He's the same God today as He always has been;
Yesterday and forever He's always the same,
There's no reason to doubt,
God can do it again!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You ask God to meet your needs,
So why not trust in Him?
For God has done it all before,
He'll do it all again.
He's willing, much more willing than I can ever say,
To perform a mighty miracle in your life today!
